'Terminus' is the fourth serial of the 20th season in the British science
fiction television series [[Doctor Who]], which was originally broadcast in four
twice-weekly parts from 15 to 23 February 1983. The serial was the second of
three loosely connected serials known as the Black Guardian Trilogy, and was the
last to feature Sarah Sutton as Nyssa.
